code: import React from"react";import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles/Footer.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Footer=()=>{const location=useLocation();const pages=[{name:"Home",path:"/",icon:"home.svg",activeIcon:"home-active.svg"},{name:"Report",path:"/report",icon:"report.svg",activeIcon:"report-active.svg"},{name:"SOS",path:"/sos",icon:"sos.svg"},{name:"Call",path:"/call",icon:"call.svg",activeIcon:"call-active.svg"},{name:"Hub",path:"/hub",icon:"hub.svg",activeIcon:"hub-active.svg"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:"footer",children:pages.map(page=>{const isActive=location.pathname===page.path;if(page.name==="SOS"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:page.path,className:`footer-link sos ${isActive?"active":""}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`/images/${page.icon}`,alt:page.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:page.name})]},page.name);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:page.path,className:`footer-link ${isActive?"active":""}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`/images/${isActive?page.activeIcon:page.icon}`,alt:page.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:page.name})]},page.name);})});};export default Footer;
